text: Robert Henry Burnside (May 20, 1933 - August 2, 2021) was an American lawyer and politician. He was a member of the South Carolina House of Representatives from 1971 to 1978. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was born in Columbia, South Carolina. Burnside died on August 2, 2021 in Columbia at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from South Carolina Category:People from Columbia, South Carolina Category:Lawyers from South Carolina Category:Businesspeople from South Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Robert H. Burnside
